channel.title: Introductory Business Statistics on Sumit Satsangi
channel.description: Recent content in Introductory Business Statistics on Sumit Satsangi

item.description: This is in continuation with the previous post. We are going to look at how the data sample is done and what could cause variation in it. 1.2. Data, Sampling, and Variation in Data and Sampling As mentioned earlier, it is generally not feasible to collect data from entire population. Data can be collected from “Sample” inside the population. But the statistician has to make sure that the sample covers all the variations in the population.

Statistics is still a complex limbo to many. When I first read the book, the ease of sharing logic was so awesome that I have kept it as one of my prized collections. Offlate, I have started reading it again and I guess it is going to be great if I can share the details of the journey with my fellow enthusiasts. The book: Amazon affiliate link: https://amzn.to/32KoM18 * Control + click or Cmd + click to open in a new tab.
